system.description:
You quickly adapt to your elemental power, developing your own style and method to manifest it.

At 2nd level, choose an adaptation. You must meet its prerequisites. You gain additional elemental adaptations as you gain levels, as shown in the adaptations column of table: “the elementalist”. Your elemental adaptation options are detailed at the end of the class description.

Additionally, when you gain a level in this class, you can choose one of the adaptations you know and replace it with another adaptation that you could learn at that level.
